content.prompt: Which of the following most accurately describes a group who acted on ideas such as those in the excerpt?

choices.label: Activists calling for preservation of the western wilderness
Southern European immigrants seeking opportunity in urban areas
Northern European immigrants pursuing mining, farming, and ranching

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
